item.title: Can the Justice Department Survive a Trump Wrecking Ball?
item.description: Over the next four years, the rule of law will face a profound test.

item.title: Biden Administration Ignites Firestorm With Rules Governing A.I.’s Global Spread
item.description: The tech industry is fighting new regulations, expected soon, that aim to keep the cutting-edge technology in the United States and allied countries.

item.title: N.Y. Prosecutors Urge Supreme Court to Let Trump’s Sentencing Proceed
item.description: The Supreme Court is now set to decide whether Donald J. Trump’s sentencing on 34 felony counts should proceed on Friday as planned.

item.title: It Is Tearing Me Up Not to Be in L.A. Right Now
item.description: Los Angeles may have a reputation for being superficial, but it is in fact a territory that might, at any moment, upend (or even end) your life.

item.title: Lebanese Lawmakers Choose a President After 2 Years of Gridlock
item.description: As the country endured economic crisis and a devastating war, lawmakers failed 12 times to pick a head of state. They have now settled on Joseph Aoun,...
